am_hal_rtc.c File Reference

Functions for interfacing with the Real-Time Clock (RTC). More...

Detailed Description

Functions for interfacing with the Real-Time Clock (RTC).

#include <stdint.h>
#include <stdbool.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"

Macros

#define RTC_CDC_WA_DELAY_US   10
 A safe delay for RTC reg read.

#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM100_10TH   0xF0
 
#define AM_HAL_RTC_ALM100_100TH   0xFF
